thread.title: Netballer humiliated after referee deemed skirt too short | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Netballer humiliated after referee deemed skirt too short | Daily Mail Online

author: Riley Morgan For Daily Mail Australia
title: Netballer humiliated after referee deemed skirt too short | Daily Mail Online
text: 'That whole quarter I was crying on court': Netballer left humiliated after her team was docked two points when the referee deemed her skirt too short because she was 'too fat' Rachael Brown, 30, said she was left humiliated during a netball game Ms Brown claims she was told her skirt was too short in front of her team Her team was docked two points and she said she was left in tears afterwards The Brisbane Netball Association said they were investigating the incident Daily Mail Australia reached out to the Brisbane Netball Association for comment
